summary: A former New Orleans cop battles drug cartels and ex-Army Special Forces who are smuggling drugs from Mexico into U.S. through a Texas border town.
cast: Jean-Claude Van Damme|Stephen Lord|Natalie J. Robb|Gary McDonald|Daniel Perrone|Scott Adkins|Andrée Bernard|Dan Davies|Miles Anderson|Luis Algar|Todd Jensen|Ivaylo Geraskov|Velislav Pavlov|Phil McKee|Bogdan Plakov|Joel Morales|Radoslav Ignatov|Dian Hristov|Sava Dragunchev|Fidana Dimitrova|Hristo Mitzkov|Georgi Ivanov Kakalov|Atanas Srebrev|Juliana Doncheva|Michael McCoy|Dimiter Doichinov|Krassimir Gospodinov|Bashar Rahal|Teodora Duhovnikova|Mike Straub|Mimoza Bazova|Eleonora Mancheva|Vladimir Bonev|Velizar Peev|J.J. Perry|George Zlatarev|Kaloian Vodenicharov|Bianca Brigitte VanDamme|Salahadine H. Beztout|Sean Johnson|Rolando Cadenas|Brandon Brandt|Alex Brown|Kathy Brayton|Siso Kamburov|Shero Rauf|Borislav Iliev|Danko Jordanov|Radoslav Parvanov
title: El patrullero: Patrulla fronteriza
